sections.heading: fair board; budget; requirements
sections.text: (1) The budget of each appointed county fair board shall be subject to annual review, audit, and approval by the county board of the county in which such fair board is located.(2) The budget of each elected county fair board shall be subject to the Nebraska Budget Ac

2-239.County fair board; budget; requirements.

(1) The budget of each appointed county fair board shall be subject to annual review, audit, and approval by the county board of the county in which such fair board is located.

(2) The budget of each elected county fair board shall be subject to the Nebraska Budget Act.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 398, ยง 2;Laws 1997, LB 469, ยง 29;Laws 1999, LB 437, ยง 17.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Budget Act, see section 13-501.
